metadata.name: A Sunday Afternoon
metadata.description:
Sunday Afternoon is a vivid tableau of botanical and interior décor still life, with its lush palette, meticulously painted details, and divided sections, each unveiling a unique story. This collection combines a blend of still life and landscape digital painting, enhanced by abstract shapes and forms that accentuate its organic charm.

Of Note: 

• This is the only 1/1 NFT of Sunday Afternoon.
• Sunday Afternoon will also be available to purchase separately as a physical art print in my shop (no nft included)
• Sunday Afternoon will also be available separately as a physical original acrylic painting on canvas (no nft included)

*at the time of my writing this, the painting and art prints are not yet available, but will be in the near future.
